energy.name: Energy
energy.journey: Building sustainable creative energy through consistent physical and mental practices. The foundation for everything else.

mind.name: Mind

stats.context: Currently reading The Master and His Emissary

mind.journey: Continuous expansion through books, courses, and deep technical exploration. Learning as a creative practice.

stats.context: Open source AI tools, creative systems
AI tutorials, creator guides, transformation stories

craft.journey: Building tools and systems that serve the creative work. Everything open, documented, and yours to use.

flow.name: Flow
flow.journey: Daily creative practice with AI music. 500+ songs later, still discovering new frequencies and possibilities.

prosperity.name: Prosperity
prosperity.journey: Building sustainable prosperity through products that genuinely transform creators. Abundance through service.

connection.name: Connection

stats.context: AI Architect bringing cloud intelligence to Fortune 500

connection.journey: Building bridges between enterprise AI and independent creators. Oracle expertise made accessible.

purpose.name: Purpose

stats.context: Every project serves creator AI transformation

purpose.journey: Every song, every tool, every course serves one purpose: empowering creators to thrive in the AI age.

assessment.instructions: Answer honestly. This isn't about perfection‚Äîit's about understanding where you are and where you want to grow.

questions.question: How would you describe your current energy management?

options.text: Exhausted and burned out‚Äîrunning on fumes
Inconsistent‚Äîsome days great, some days terrible
Decent‚ÄîI have routines but they're not optimized
Strong‚Äîconsistent practices fuel my creative work
Exceptional‚Äîenergy is my superpower and foundation

questions.question: How actively are you expanding your knowledge and skills?

options.text: Stagnant‚Äîhaven't learned anything new in months
Occasional‚ÄîI learn when something catches my interest
Regular‚Äîreading books, taking some courses
Intentional‚Äîdedicated learning time, strategic skill-building
Insatiable‚Äîlearning is a core daily practice for me

questions.question: Where are you in developing your technical/creative skills?

options.text: Beginner‚Äîjust starting to explore tools and techniques
Learning‚Äîactively building skills but not shipping much
Competent‚Äîcreating regularly, building my portfolio
Advanced‚Äîshipping quality work consistently
Mastery‚Äîmy craft is a powerful expression of who I am

questions.question: How often do you experience deep creative flow states?

options.text: Rarely‚ÄîI'm usually distracted and scattered
Occasionally‚Äîflow happens by accident sometimes
Weekly‚ÄîI have flow moments in my creative work
Daily‚ÄîI've built rituals that reliably create flow
Consistently‚Äîflow is my natural creative state

questions.question: Where are you in monetizing your creative work?

options.text: Not monetized‚Äîpure hobby, no income
Exploring‚Äîthinking about offers but haven't launched
Early revenue‚Äîfirst products launched, some sales
Growing income‚Äîsustainable side income or scaling
Thriving business‚Äîcreative work fully supports my life

questions.question: How strong is your creative community and network?

options.text: Isolated‚Äîcreating alone, no community
Limited‚Äîa few creative friends but not a real network
Developing‚Äîactively building community and connections
Strong network‚Äîregular collaborations and mutual support
Powerful ecosystem‚Äîcommunity amplifies my creative impact

questions.question: How aligned is your creative work with your deeper purpose?

options.text: Lost‚Äînot sure what my purpose even is
Unclear‚ÄîI have ideas but no clear direction
Emerging‚Äîmy purpose is becoming clearer
Aligned‚ÄîI know my why and most work serves it
Living it‚Äîmy creative work IS my purpose in action

awakening_creator.name: Awakening Creator
awakening_creator.description: You're at the beginning of a powerful transformation. The fact that you're here shows you're ready to evolve beyond where you are. Every master was once where you are now.
awakening_creator.strengths: Open to growth, willing to learn, potential is unlimited
awakening_creator.nextSteps: Focus on building Energy and Mind foundations. Start with small daily practices.

emerging_builder.name: Emerging Builder
emerging_builder.description: You're actively building your creative systems and skills. You've moved past beginner and you're establishing real practices. This is where consistency becomes your superpower.
emerging_builder.strengths: Building momentum, developing discipline, growing skillset
emerging_builder.nextSteps: Strengthen your Craft and Flow practices. Ship more work, create more often.

rising_creator.name: Rising Creator
rising_creator.description: You're in your power. Solid foundations, regular creative output, and you're finding your rhythm. The path is becoming clear, and you're walking it with intention.
rising_creator.strengths: Consistent execution, clear direction, balanced growth
rising_creator.nextSteps: Focus on Prosperity and Connection. Start monetizing, build your tribe.

seasoned_creator.name: Seasoned Creator
seasoned_creator.description: You've built something real. Your creative practice sustains you, your skills are sharp, and you're making genuine impact. You know the journey never ends‚Äîthere's always another level.
seasoned_creator.strengths: Proven track record, sustainable systems, authentic impact
seasoned_creator.nextSteps: Deepen Purpose alignment. Share your knowledge, mentor others.

master_creator.name: Master Creator
master_creator.description: You've achieved what most only dream of‚Äîmastery across all dimensions of creative life. Your work transforms others, your systems are optimized, and you're living your purpose. Now the mission is to lift others up.
master_creator.strengths: Complete integration, powerful impact, embodied mastery
master_creator.nextSteps: Lead the transformation. Build the systems that empower the next generation.
